name: Google Reader Subscription List
author: Timothy Broder

sections.description: This plugin will display the feeds that you subscribe to in Google Reader on a wordpress page
sections.installation:
1. Install and activate the Zend Framework plugin https://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/zend-framework/
  2. Upload google-reader-subscription-list.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Fill out user credentials on the options page
  5. Create a blank page with a custom field “show-google-reader-sub-list” with the value true

short_description: This plugin will display the feeds that you subscribe to in Google Reader on a wordpress page
description: This plugin will display the feeds that you subscribe to in Google Reader on a wordpress page
